ch0014_90_cheren/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Are you
studying up on battles again today?
ch0014_90_cheren/0101_0701_02_10:
You’re just going to keep getting stronger. I won’t
let myself fall behind!
ch0014_90_cheren/7101_0701_01_10:
Wearing this Neo Champion outfit is honestly a bit
overwhelming for me...
ch0014_90_cheren/7101_0701_02_10:
Ever since I started my journey, it’s been my goal
to be acknowledged as a strong Trainer.
ch0014_90_cheren/7101_0701_03_10:
But this is only the beginning! I have to stay
focused and work even harder!
ch0014_90_cheren/7102_0701_01_10:
What does it mean to be strong? I’m sure you’ve
struggled with this question before.
ch0014_90_cheren/7102_0701_02_10:
I’ve been there too. At the time, Alder’s the one
who offered me guidance.
ch0014_90_cheren/7102_0701_03_10:
Now I understand how difficult it can be to guide
others on their path.
ch0014_90_cheren/7103_0701_01_10: I’m a wall for Unova’s Trainers to overcome.
ch0014_90_cheren/7103_0701_02_10:
I can’t just let myself be a mere obstacle, though.
That’d be pointless.
ch0014_90_cheren/7103_0701_03_10:
I have to make the experience of getting past me
meaningful.
ch0014_90_cheren/7104_0701_01_10:
I’ve encountered people from all walks of life, and
the things I learned from them couldn’t have been
gleaned from winning or losing battles.
ch0014_90_cheren/7104_0701_02_10:
That’s why I want to teach all sorts of things to
Trainers who’re only just beginning their journey.
ch0014_90_cheren/7104_0701_03_10:
I can offer them my perspective as a Gym Leader,
a teacher...and now, as a Neo Champion.
ch0014_90_cheren/7105_0701_01_10:
Is there someone in your life you never want to
lose to, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0014_90_cheren/7105_0701_02_10:
It’s important to have a rival so you can push each
other to greater and greater heights.
ch0014_90_cheren/7105_0701_03_10:
By taking different paths, you will each discover
the path that’s meant for you and you alone.
ch0014_90_cheren/7105_0701_04_10:
That’s just one example of what I believe is an
ideal relationship.
ch0014_90_cheren/1701_0701_01_10: Hey. There’s something I want to give you.
ch0014_90_cheren/1701_0702_01_10:
You can never know too much about items, you
know!
ch0014_90_cheren/2501_0701_01_10:
There are so many different students who come to
the Trainers’ School.
ch0014_90_cheren/2501_0701_02_10:
A lot of them are concerned about winning or
losing Pokémon battles.
ch0014_90_cheren/2501_0701_03_10:
So instead, I try to get them think about what it
means to battle side by side with their Pokémon.
ch0014_90_cheren/2501_0702_01_10:
What do you think it means to battle side by side
with your Pokémon?
ch0014_90_cheren/2501_0702_02_10:
There’s no single right answer to that question, but
there are definitely wrong ones.
ch0014_90_cheren/2501_0702_03_10:
I hope you’ll take this opportunity to think about
the relationship between Pokémon and people.
ch0014_90_cheren/2511_0701_01_10:
Neo Champions are supposed be role models for
the other sync pairs on Pasio.
ch0014_90_cheren/2511_0701_02_10:
At first, I was worried whether I was qualified
enough to fulfill that responsibility.
ch0014_90_cheren/2511_0701_03_10:
But meeting you all here on Pasio has given me
the confidence I need.
ch0014_90_cheren/2511_0702_01_10:
I think I’ve finally found the path that’ll lead me to
become the person I’m meant to be.
ch0014_90_cheren/2511_0702_02_10:
That said, I’ll proudly continue to set an example
for everyone and be someone they look up to!
ch0014_90_cheren/3001_0701_01_10:
You’ve been working hard all morning. Your effort
will definitely be worth it!
ch0014_90_cheren/3003_0701_01_10:
There are a lot of things you can’t learn in a
classroom. Sometimes, you have to go out and
see it all for yourself.
ch0014_90_cheren/3005_0701_01_10:
Hey, good evening. Would you like to go over the
materials we covered in class?
